Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
divs: sighting detailslooking out bay window in dining room facing west at approx 20-30 miles away over lake champlain \ addirondacs ny noticed what at first seemed to be a helicopter. the random red flashes too bright at that distance to be helicopter. moved very fast side to side and diagonally instantaniously, and disappeared when i tried viewing with 10x50 binoculars and reappeared about 90 degrees to the north with-in a second. event is happeneing right now as i write. whitnessed by another person and myself. still to the north approx 15 degress above the horizon. and seen thru the trees approximatly 30 - 50 miles in the distance. red flashes to bright to be an aircraft or helicopter. remained in a fixed position for 20+ minutes. now appears further away to the north. the weather here is calm and clear skies, no clouds, and about 50 degree temperature.
Summary: Very unusual pulsing White light With random BRIGHT RED Flashes
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Rutland
